note:
Energy Efficiency Consultant mostly for large buildings, municipalities, institutions.

Stuff I do now: dadding, energy efficiency, cooperative housing, community gardening.

Stuff I did before: equity and inclusion, large-scale composting, sustainable ag, engineering anomalies, small-scale biofuels, documentary production, art (light sculpture, illustration, video), world music, mouth percussion, fruit-tree grafting, ecotourism research, swimming, tennis.
